attributes.action: Ban garden bonfires during the Covid 19 pandemic lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Bonfires should be banned at this current time. Many people are having garden bonfires due to garden waste not being collected. This causes health problems for people with respiratory conditions and for those recovering from Coronavirus. It is also an unpleasant nuisance to people who rely on their gardens for exercise at present.
attributes.background: Ban garden bonfires during the Covid 19 pandemic lockdown.
